Entries.Introduction: O-Oh, hello. It's nice to meet you!#$e#You picked a good time to move here... The spring is lovely.
Entries.Resort_Entering: Don't tell anyone, but Willy let me steer the boat for a few minutes.$h
Entries.Resort: I love the weather in Stardew Valley, but seeing a different climate now and then helps put things into perspective.
Entries.Resort_Shore: The shape of the waves here is awe inspiring.#$e#I wonder if I could ever capture that sort of formlessness in a sculpture.
Entries.Resort_Chair: I like the heat as long as I'm keeping perfectly still.$h
Entries.Resort_Wander: Mmm, I bet the trees around here would make for an interesting medium to work with.#$e#Though Willy probably wouldn't be happy with me if I dragged a bunch of logs onto his ship!$h
Entries.Resort_Wander_2: I wonder what kind of things you could forage out here.#$e#I think I saw some tasty looking walnuts growing on a bush nearby.
Entries.Resort_Bar: Have you tried the Pi√±a Colada? I'm on my second one... hehe.
Entries.danceRejection: I'll be honest. I don't want to dance with you.$u
Entries.divorced: I've realized I'm happier by myself. So just leave me be.$u
Entries.breakUp: Ohh... Got it. Hah... I really don't have any luck when it comes to this stuff...$s
Entries.dumped_Girls: I don't want to see you for a while...$s
Entries.secondChance_Girls: You caused a lot of grief with what you did... but I'm ready to put the past behind us.$s
Entries.Beach: I came for the sound of the ocean. Beautiful, isn't it?
Entries.event_sculpt2: There's nothing wrong with that... I think there's lots of beauty to be found in raw, untouched nature!#$b#But as a human, I'm also interested in how we shape and interpret the world around us... I guess what I'm saying is that I'm interested in 'art'.
Entries.event_sculpt3: You pig!%fork$a^Oh! You're...? Me too.$6#$b#Get out!$a^That's good to know.$l
Entries.event_parents1: You're right... I just wouldn't have been happy back there.$u#$b#It was better for both of us... to end an unsustainable relationship while we were still young and flexible.$u
Entries.event_parents2: That's a little harsh... but, yeah. We had different priorities.$u
Entries.event_parents3: Oh yeah? Well maybe I'll just leave, then!%fork$a
Entries.event_parents4: *sigh*...$s#$b#I guess you're right... it was kind of selfish. But can you really blame me for wanting to be happy? Ugh... I don't know...$s
Entries.event_parents5: *sigh*...$s#$b#Maybe you're right... Humans are selfish creatures. I don't know. $s#$b#I probably shouldn't dwell on it. We all have to make hard choices from time to time.$s
Entries.Mon: The trees look nice today, don't they?#$q 21/22/211132 Mon_old#So why did you become a farmer?#$r 21 -5 Mon_21#I want to make tons of money.#$r 22 5 Mon_22#It's more "real" than living in the city.#$r 211132 5 Mon_211132#To follow in grandpa's footsteps.#$r 22 5 Mon_22#I wanted to escape my old life.
Entries.Mon_old: $p 21#So are you making as much money as you hoped?|Spending time in nature is very rewarding.
Entries.Mon_21: Hmm. That seems kind of shallow, doesn't it?$s
Entries.Mon_22: That's pretty much the reason I came here, too!$h
Entries.Mon_211132: That's very sweet to honor your grandfather like that.
Entries.Tue: Hello, neighbor.#$e#We both live outside of town. Does that mean something?
Entries.Tue4: Hi... Oh, you want to talk?#$e#The landscape around here gives me a lot of ideas... The terrain is almost like a sculpture itself.$7#$e#I don't really create art for the money, I just have the urge to make things.#$e#Farming seems like a very rewarding profession. You get to create delicious food for everyone!$h#$e#You're probably busy. Sorry...
Entries.Wed: #$1 LeahBug#This morning I accidentally stepped on a bug.$s#$e#Sometimes I think it's impossible to live without destroying nature in some way.
Entries.Wed6: I love being around animals. They're so innocent.#$e#Farm animals are wonderful, too.$h
Entries.Wed8: Hi @! I was just thinking about you and your farm.#$e#I was imagining how good it must feel to harvest a big bunch of crops.$h#$e#Wouldn't it be nice to have help, though?$l
Entries.Thu: There's actually a lot of wild food in this area, if you know where to look.#$e#I've been having fresh salads almost every day.$h
Entries.Thu6: Foraging is a specialty of mine. Someday I'll make you a fresh salad.$h
Entries.Fri: It's simpler to be friends with the trees. They don't have much to say.$h
Entries.Fri2: We wouldn't be able to survive without nature. It's good to remember that.
Entries.Fri4: Hello, @. It's a nice day, isn't it?#$e#Stop by my cabin if you ever need someone to talk to.$h
Entries.Sat: I love to decorate for the different seasons.
Entries.Sun: If you hear any banging from inside my hut, it's probably just me working on one of my sculptures.
Entries.summer_Mon: I found some wild fruits this morning!#$e#Sorry, I don't have any left.$s#$e#Keep looking, I'm sure you'll find something.
Entries.summer_Tue: The sound of farm animals is great, isn't it?$1
Entries.summer_Thu: I have a pretty good eye for wild forage.#$b#...If I get hungry while I'm out drawing in the woods, I can usually find a snack.$1
Entries.summer_Fri: You can use a tapper to harvest syrups and other useful liquids directly from trees.#$e#It's a slow process, but the result can be quite valuable.
Entries.summer_Fri2: I hate to be blunt, but if we don't treat nature with respect, our grandchildren will be doomed.$2#$e#Don't you think so?
Entries.summer_Fri6: Hello, @. Do you ever get lonely on that big farm?#$e#Stop by my cabin if you ever need someone to talk to.$h
Entries.summer_Sat: The flowing water keeps my house a little bit cooler in summer.#$e#I can't tolerate heat very well.
Entries.summer_Sun: What should I do on such a warm, lazy day? *sigh*#$e#Any ideas?
Entries.summer_1: You can tell it's summer by the sweet smell of nectar wafting through the air!$h
Entries.fall_Mon: #$c .5#I found some wild mushrooms over the weekend!#$e#I had a huge plate of wild mushrooms and eggs for breakfast today... I'm still full.#$e#Keep your nose to the ground and you'll find some mushrooms yourself... I'm sure of it.
Entries.fall_Tue: I wonder if I could make a collage out of dried leaves?#$e#They're just so colorful... I can't help but think of the potential for art projects.$h
Entries.fall_Wed: It's nice to live by the river...#$e#I get to fall asleep to the soothing sound of water every night.
Entries.fall_Wed8: My house is so close to the water, so I listen to the water flowing every night when I fall asleep...#$e#Now that I wear diapers, I'm back to being a bed-wetter again. *giggle*$1
Entries.fall_Thu6: One of these days I'll have to make you a wild mushroom stir-fry.$h
Entries.fall_Fri: Do you have a kitchen in your house?#$e#If you have a kitchen, you can cook all kinds of delicious meals.$h
Entries.fall_Fri6: Stop by my cabin if you ever need someone to talk to.$h
Entries.fall_Sat: Decorations accentuate the feeling of the season. I think it's a worthwhile tradition.
Entries.fall_Sun: There's a lot of good places to walk around here.#$e#It feels good to stretch your legs.
Entries.fall_1: How quickly the seasons change!#$e#It's shocking.
Entries.winter_Mon: I love the way everything looks when it's covered with fresh snow.
Entries.winter_Tue: It gets pretty cold in my little cabin.$s#$e#I just snuggle up under a huge blanket, and I'm okay.$h
Entries.winter_Wed: I saw a snow rabbit early this morning! They're rare, aren't they?
Entries.winter_Thu: I'm having a hard time finding fresh food to eat.#$e#I've been eating a lot of bread.$s
Entries.winter_Thu6: *Sigh*... It's hard to get fresh food in the winter.#$e#I bet your farm is pretty well stocked with food, huh?
Entries.winter_Fri: Time seems to move slower here.#$e#When I lived in the city, the year went by so fast.
Entries.winter_Fri6: Do you ever get cold in that farmhouse of yours?#$e#Stop by my cabin if you want to huddle under one of my quilts and drink cider.$h
Entries.winter_Sat2: Hello, @. Is there something you wanted to talk about?
Entries.winter_Sun: Do you ever take a whole day off?#$e#It's a refreshing break.

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: This house is a lot nicer than my old cabin! I don't miss it.
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, @. I've planted these in a little pot out back... [16 18 20 22 90 259 396 402]#$e#I grew that with great love and attention. Enjoy it.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Always remember to keep your eyes peeled for wild food! There's lots out there.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I was thinking... life's too short to eat bad food. Luckily, we live in one of the best regions for fresh greens and vegetables!#$e#Here, I made you a healthy salad. [196]#$e#I'm surprised you aren't sick of my salad yet!
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, @! I made us some coffee.[395]$h#$e#My morning just wouldn't be complete without a hot cup of coffee.
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Something about this time of night makes me thirsty.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: The flow of time is so delicate... even the tiniest decision changes the future forever.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: It's so much lovelier here at night than the garish glow of the city.#$e#Everything worked out perfectly for me. I'm very lucky.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: I never thought I'd receive a mermaid's pendant so soon after moving here! I'm happy about it, though.$l
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I saw a wild rabbit today. I just wish I could pet one someday. They look so soft...
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I sometimes find inspiration in the most unlikely of places.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I used to find rain depressing when I lived in the city. But here in Stardew Valley it's beautiful.
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Good morning! I got up early and did some mushroom hunting. Here, take one.[281 404 420 257]#$e#Searching for mushrooms is like going on a treasure hunt. It's a lot of fun.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: It's days like this I'm really happy about my heavy-duty boots.$h
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: The trees have been begging for this rain... I'm happy for them.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: How was your day? Did you see any animals out there?
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: I usually go for salad... but a wet night like this gives me cravings for hot soup.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: It's going to be relaxing to fall asleep on a night like this...$l
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I made a little wood sculpture today, but it was so ugly I threw it into the fire.$u#$e#I think to become a great artist, you have to be critical of your own work.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to get under the covers and stay warm.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Leah: How was your day today, dear? Muddy?
Entries.patio_Leah: Don't look too close, it's a work in progress.
Entries.Outdoor_0: The cool breeze feels nice. It reminds me of living by the river.
Entries.Outdoor_1: Hmm... I'm going to do some maintenance over here. I just get the urge to do some hammering now and then.
Entries.Outdoor_2: It's going to be a special day, I can sense it.
Entries.Outdoor_3: Ah... that smell of fresh dirt. There's nothing quite like it.$h#$e#You can just tell the air is clean here... it feels good in the lungs.
Entries.Outdoor_4: Don't overwork yourself, dear.#$e#Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.$h
Entries.funLeave_Leah: I'm going to take a nature walk today. I need to get out of the house.
Entries.funReturn_Leah: I had a nice, relaxing time today. How did your day go?
Entries.OneKid_3: It's fun to be a parent. I want to make sure %kid1 grows up to have a love for the outdoors.
Entries.TwoKids_3: We've got a wonderful farm and a full family. Our new life has really turned out well, hasn't it?
Entries.Good_0: Living here, I feel like I'm on the summit of a great mountain.
Entries.Good_1: Did I ever tell you... when you first moved here I had a dream that we'd be together someday.
Entries.Good_2: Sometimes it's hard not to believe in destiny... the fact that I decided to move here, and that we found each other.#$b#It could've gone entirely differently at any point.
Entries.Good_3: Wow, you look full of energy today!$l^You look beautiful today.$l
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring my wedding amulet... I'll cherish this treasure for the rest of my life.$l
Entries.Good_6: Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft.
Entries.Good_7: @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.$h
Entries.Good_8: Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!$l
Entries.Good_9: Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here.#$e#It's a simple life, but I like it.$h
Entries.Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray.
Entries.Neutral_1: I wonder who lived here before us?
Entries.Neutral_2: Don't you have anything to do today?
Entries.Neutral_3: If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
Entries.Neutral_4: I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.
Entries.Neutral_5: Are we doing okay on money, @?
Entries.Neutral_6: I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?
Entries.Neutral_7: I don't really feel like doing anything today.
Entries.Neutral_8: No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again.#$e#I guess farms can be kind of dirty.
Entries.Neutral_9: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?
Entries.Bad_1: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.$s
Entries.Bad_2: Are you still happy with me?s
Entries.Bad_3: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.$s
Entries.Bad_4: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?$s
Entries.Bad_5: You used to be romantic... what happened?$s#$e#I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for?$a
Entries.Bad_6: We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?$s
Entries.Bad_7: I used to be your sweetie... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.$s
Entries.Bad_8: You've been so cold to me lately...$s
Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better.$s
Entries.spring_2: So, what are we planting this season?
Entries.spring_1: That was some way to ring in the new year last night...$l
Entries.spring_15: *sigh*... I guess it's time for the 'spring cleaning' again.$s
Entries.summer_1: Ah, summer... I can smell the spice berries already.$h
Entries.summer_9: Sorry if I'm wet to the touch... I was sweating all night in the heat.
Entries.summer_2: It's summer... that means the house is full of flies.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them.
Entries.fall_1: I love fall for the mushroom hunting opportunities. It comes and goes pretty fast.
Entries.fall_20: Have you planned for winter at all? It's good to have a stockpile of hay.
Entries.fall_2: I know harvest season is a busy time for you. I'll try and help out as much as I can.
Entries.winter_1: Winter's here, and that means crystal fruit is in season. It has such a unique flavor, don't you think?
Entries.winter_7: I'm looking forward to carving ice sculptures tomorrow. I only get to do it once a year, but it's a lot of fun!
Entries.winter_28: Hey, here's to another great year at %farm farm! Let's have some fun tonight! [348]$h#$e#Next year is going to be great, I can feel it.
